entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain in the evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
